gevplus 0.0.1
  • Reference

gevplus

R-package with functions for Fitting the Generalized Extreme Value Distribution constrained to Positive Shape Parameters

Based on Moccia et al., 2021

Installation

You can install the development version of gevplus from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("haraldschellander/gevplus")
